snippet: My obstetrician ignored my symptoms of postpartum depression, and told me to take more ‘me’ time. Just like that, I slipped through the cracks, and I’m not alone. There’s no universal screening for depression in women after giving birth.
abstract: My obstetrician ignored my symptoms of postpartum depression, and told me to take more ‘me’ time. Just like that, I slipped through the cracks, and I’m not alone. There’s no universal screening for depression in women after giving birth.

headline.main: Who Will Screen for Postpartum Depression?
